title: Monthly Reports Received
description: Total number of reports received through official and community channels each month.
interpretationHint: Increases may reflect raised awareness or improved reporting access.
warningText: Data does not represent all cases; underreporting is common.

title: Daily Hotline Calls
description: Number of calls made to the national support hotline each day.
interpretationHint: Higher call volume may indicate increased outreach or community awareness.
warningText: Not all callers disclose the full nature of their concerns.

title: Weekly Case Resolutions
description: Cases where individuals received meaningful assistance or next-step guidance.
interpretationHint: Higher resolution numbers can reflect improved coordination among services.
warningText: Resolution does not imply long-term outcome.

title: Shelter Capacity Usage
description: Percentage of available shelter spaces currently in use.
interpretationHint: Higher percentages may indicate increased demand for safe accommodation.
warningText: Capacity varies by region and may change quickly.

title: Online Support Chat Volume
description: Number of online chat sessions initiated on the digital support platform.
interpretationHint: Online services may be preferred for privacy or accessibility.
warningText: Chat sessions represent initial contacts, not full support cases.

title: Monthly Legal Information Inquiries
description: Requests for legal guidance or next-step information.
interpretationHint: Higher numbers may reflect community awareness of available rights.
warningText: Inquiries do not represent formal legal action.

title: Community Workshop Attendance
description: Participation in community education and awareness events.
interpretationHint: Higher attendance may indicate community readiness for shared learning.
warningText: Some workshops have limited space, affecting attendance numbers.

title: Follow-Up Support Completed
description: Support follow-ups completed by trained community responders.
interpretationHint: Completed follow-ups can reflect engagement and continuity of care.
warningText: Follow-up numbers vary depending on available personnel.

title: Resource Page Clicks
description: Number of views on online educational and support resources.
interpretationHint: Increased clicks can reflect growing interest in support information.
warningText: Clicks do not measure completion or understanding.

title: Regional Support Requests
description: Number of support requests received from different regions.
interpretationHint: Regional variations may reflect population differences and resource availability.
warningText: Requests do not reflect all community needs.
